name: Arcade Madness
description:
It appears to be a little laggy in the brower, also you might want to turn your volume down or mute the browser tab, especially if you are playing in the browser which seems to lag the already less than optimal quality audio out some lol. To fix the screen being cut off in the browser you may need to fullscreen it using the blue button in the bottom right.

This is a small, top-down, endless arcade game I made using Unity game engine. It is the first game I have made without directly following a tutorial. The music along with a few sound effects are from the course library from the free Unity course "Create With Code." The rest of the sounds I made using a mix of SFXR and Audacity, however I am not very good at sound design or pixel art, but I did my best. (I decided to only make sprites for the powerups and leave the enemies as just capsules/circles) I took a little bit of inspiration for this project from the "Journey of the Prairie King" from Stardew Valley.
